archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Security Management Analysis
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Policy-based assessment of collected/correlated data for events or trends of interest. Analysis may apply correlation and other functions over the collected data to form a more complete and accurate picture of events and conditions â€“ for example, to detect patterns and trends that would not otherwise be visible.Â Ideally, policy-based assessment methodologies are used in analysis, with those policies also being specified as an integral part of the Prevention process.

properties.value: Not used for this process element.
